sections.title: interests
sections.content: Originally from New Zealand, I have worked as a software engineer building cloud infrastructure for machine learning models, a software researcher conceptualizing and building interactive visualizations, and previously as both a mobile developer and a full stack engineer.

body.title: Halter: Senior Software Engineer
body.content: Building a feature store in Flink on AWS, devops in Docker/ConcourseCI for Python applications, contributions to microservices in Node/Java.

body.title: Forensic Architecture: Advanced Software Researcher
body.content: Engineering full stack platforms and machine learning workflows, conceptualizing and building interactive visualizations and tools to assist human rights research.

body.title: Merantix: Full Stack Engineer
body.content: Tooling for deep learning workflows, working mainly in Python and the Jupyter notebook stack, Kubernetes, GCP, Tensorflow, Vue, and React.

body.title: DirectDrinks: CTO and Co-founder
body.content: Platform for a direct sales channels between large corporate suppliers and small resellers in the FMCG industry, disrupting a pipeline that is currently dominated by mid-tier redistributors. Digital platform for web, mobile, and tablet.

body.title: Inflection: Mobile Developer
body.content: Developed an Objective C SDK for an OAuth2 verification flow, and prototyped two React Native applications. Contributions to Dockerized Rails backend.

body.title: Artirigo AG: Full Stack Developer
body.content: React Native frontend for iOS and Android. Contributions to a Rails application.

body.title: Brown University
body.content: Graduate Student in Modern Culture and Media

sections.title: portfolio | references
sections.content: For contributions on GitHub [@breezykermo](https://github.com/breezykermo). Twitter [@lachlankermode](https://www.twitter.com/lachlankermode). Visit [resume.lachlankermode.com](http://resume.lachlankermode.com) for active links in this resume. References available on request.
